data.title: The Dow Event Center
data.meta_description: The Dow Event Center is comprised of three main parts: Wendler Arena, Heritage Theater and Unity Hall. In addition to The Dow Event Center is the FirstMerit Bank Event Park, which is across the street. Serving as a first class event venue, offering residents hundreds of entertainment, sports, cultural, and educational opportunities. The Dow Event Center is a competitor not only in the entertainment business but the business of special catered events, hosting Anniversary Celebrations, Wedding Receptions, Conferences, High School Proms and everything in between.
data.meta_site_name: Pure Michigan | Official Travel & Tourism Website for Michigan
data.text:
303 Johnson Street, Saginaw, MI48607

Reviews

ASGLondon | May 2024

Great Arena

I visited this arena for the Memorial Cup in May 2024 with a bunch of my friends. The facility is easy to get to from the highway. There was lots of parking near the location. The facility itself...

Adelia V | April 2024

GREAT PLACE BUT NO CAB SERVICE

Great place. NO CAB SERVICE. Also, the American fans, could be a bit more appreciative of the Canadian fans that travel for the OHL. We stayed at the Hampton Inn Hotel in Saginaw, MI - Hilton...

PatSSN | April 2023

80 degrees outside and freezing on the ice floor

Our friends went to the Jim Gaffigan comedy show recently. Here is the good and the bad Good Parking is easy to get in and outside of the venue. Bad 1. Food choices in the center has no healthy...

browncondo2102 | January 2023

Fans are still crazy here

Went to watch the Spirit play. Fans are still rabid here. Lots of noise and cheering. Since we were opposing fans, a number of Spirit fans were interested in talking to us and made us feel welcome.

Katy B | September 2022

Great Venue

I really enjoyed this venue when I attended a recent concert. Large, modern and the seats were bigger than expected.
